Comprar entradas para la Convención Naci: Buy tickets for the 2022 iad Spain National Convention
Todos los asesores y managers: All advisors and managers of the iad Spain network regardless of their category: Manager Bronze, Silver, Gold, Platinum and Platinum Partner.
tambien managers internacionales: International managers with godchildren within the iad network in Spain may also attend.
y el resto de filiales del Grupo iad: headquarters and the rest of the subsidiaries of the iad Group
Es mi primera Convención Nacional: It is my first National Convention, why is it important to attend?
La Convención Nacional es uno de los eve: The National Convention is one of the most important events of the network that is held annually in all countries. It is the only occasion where we all get together, agents, managers, headquarters staff, etc., to celebrate the successes achieved during the year and preview those to come.
Durante la Convención Nacional se realiz: During the National Convention, the award ceremony for the annual challenges takes place, the news for the following fiscal year is presented and we all share unforgettable moments together.
Precio 65,00€: Price 65,00€ (taxes not included). Rate available until 15th august 2022 or while supplies last (80 first tickets).
*La tarifa “Early Bird,” de coste: The “Early Bird” rate, at a reduced cost, is a special price rate intended for people who buy tickets for the event well in advance and whose objective is to benefit those who plan and confirm their attendance several months ahead .
Precio 89,00€ (IVA no incluido): Precio 89,00€ (taxes not included). Full cost of the ticket fixed based on the location, content and services offered. Applicable from 08/15/2022 or while supplies last of the "Early Bird" rate
Managers internacionales con: International managers with godchildren in iad Spain..Price 89,00€ (taxes not included).
¿Cuál es el dress code: What is the dress code for the National Convention?
¿Puedo venir con un acompañante?: Can I come with a companion?
No, no se admiten acompañantes: No, companions are not allowed. iad events are exclusively for members of the iad Group.
Hay algún convenio con hoteles: Is there an agreement with hotels or accommodation suggestions?
Sí, puedes consultar todas las posibilid: yes, you can check all the possibilities on the “Hotels” page or by clicking
¿Puedo comprar entradas a mis ahijados o: Can I buy tickets for my godchildren or my team?
Sí, es posible en la página de compra de: Yes, it is possible on the purchase page of your tickets. Once you have started the process of buying your tickets, enter your godson's data in
De esta forma: In this way, you will be the person who makes the payment and the purchase, but the tickets will go to the name of your godson.
¿Puedo comprar varias entradas: Can I buy several tickets in my name and give them to my colleagues or godchildren?
No está permitido comprar varias entrada: It is not allowed to buy several tickets with the same name, since each ticket is personal and non-transferable. However, you can buy tickets for other people by always indicating their details in the “Assistant details” section. See question 7.
Si has adquirido varias: If you have purchased several tickets with the same attendee name, contact
para la modificación de los datos: to modify the data and avoid access problems on the day of the event.
¿Hay una cantidad máxima de compra de en: Is there a maximum amount of ticket purchase?
Sí, 2 entradas por compra: Yes, 2 tickets per purchase that only applies in the case of the reduced price "Early Bird" rate. A measure that has been taken to be able to give access to all iad agents.
Las entradas adquiridas: Tickets purchased for the event will not be refunded without justified cause.

especificando a quién vendes: specifying who you are selling or giving your ticket to and we will make the name change.
